name: Lost in Translation (itty bitty kimchi, SafetyDad)
name_original: Lost in Translation (itty bitty kimchi, SafetyDad)
description:
Lost in Translation; 

Use keyboard to type and mouse to click.
We are not alone in the universe. Humanity was recently contacted by an alien society and has invited The President of the Entire World to their home to negotiate a treaty among planets. The President has reached out to you to help translate the alien language and help him respond to their questions. Solve puzzles, crack the code, and help save the world!

Music: Neon Laser Horizon - Kevin MacLeod

Programming: Alex Rose / SafetyDad Studios
Visuals: Cheryl Cruz, Jared Thome

Released: August 28, 2022
